name: hm07
effect: Teaches Waterfall to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches a move to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III & II: Waterfall)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Attacks the foe
with enough power
to climb waterfalls.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Attacks the foe
with enough power
to climb waterfalls.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A powerful charge
attack. It can also
be used to climb
a waterfall.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user charges the foe at an
awesome speed. It can also be used
to climb a waterfall.

The user charges the foe at an
awesome speed. It can also be used
to climb a waterfall.

The user charges the foe at an
awesome speed. It can also be used

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and
attacks on the next turn.
